name: Soul Less
description:
Hi my name is James Dennis I'm 10 i like to play video games so that's why I wanted to create one  this is my first so please excuse how bad it is(Game may include references from Last stop    and can be found here)    (https://taintedgames.itch.io/last-stop ) 

      Anywho my game is is about your a dude who going insane and going through some horror shit.  

this is a demo of level1 (final game will come soon)  and please comment with suggestions and things I need to fix so that I can make it better.  Remember that I am 10 years old so please be kind......
